website_summaries.verdict: The best option if you're looking for a very large shower cap.
pros: Large enough for long and big hair
Covers your hair without flattening it
cons: Not for you unless you need a very large shower cap

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: Gigantic and perfect for my jumbo box braids ^_^ Over a foot long just laying down. However, I don't think the quality is worth the price. It already started to separate at the seams and the ends aren't hemmed so it pokes into my forehead, ears and neck :/ The last photos are to show how I keep it out of the way when showering :)
customer_reviews.author: Pluverian

customer_reviews.title: Definitely big enough
customer_reviews.text: The size is good. Mine has already formed a small hole in the top somehow after a week and a half making me wish that it at least had a lining. But the hole is fairly small for now. It would have been nice if the hat came with a plastic ring or drawstring for sizing it down some too because it's so big it gets hit with soap and water just because it's in the way. But the hat gets the job done. Full coverage. Thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Mommyoftwo

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 of these. My daughter and I needed a extra large shower cap for when we are wearing braids or extensions. This is the biggest shower cap I have ever seen. BIG hair look no further, this is what you need. Descent quality. We have have been using this same cap for 2.5 years with no issues, until my son put a whole in it. Will need to order another asap!
customer_reviews.author: SheLuvsGodTop Contributor: Nail Art

customer_reviews.title: Very Big
customer_reviews.text: Was surprised at how big it was, but it gets the job done. [UPDATE 2/5/18]: The elastic wears down after a while. Have to reorder every few months. The size is still great and there's been no issues with tearing. Will keep ordering until I find something around the same price, the same size, and with better material (which is not likely).
customer_reviews.author: AJay_89

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!!
customer_reviews.text: For a head full of dreadlocks, this is your shower cap. It holds all my hair and keeps it dry. Very nice price for the product. Yes, it is large but the other caps I tried did nothing to help me keep my hair from getting damp, causing mild dread 'rot' and that 'funny smell'.
customer_reviews.author: DentalRn

customer_reviews.title: It absolutely didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: This shower cap is way too big for my head. Super jumbo is right. Get this only if you have long locks way down your back or big jumbo braids. It’s very big and clumsy and falls over your eyes. Again, get this only if you have a lot of hair. It will be too big for Neck length hair. I guess I’ll keep looking for a good one that will cover the back of my hair so that it won’t keep getting wet after my shower. I gave it 3 stars cas it may be durable for someone with a lot of hair.
customer_reviews.author: Dimple C

customer_reviews.title: Big enough for a huge hairstyle. You'll love this!
customer_reviews.text: This is great for people who have very long hair or a big hairstyle. It is heavy enough vinyl to easily keep the hair dry. It fits over any hairstyle to the point where you could almost get lost in it. LOL! I have hair almost to my waist and I am able to get all of it up under the cap, and it stays dry. This is a no-brainer! You won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Princessnana1999

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this shower cap
customer_reviews.text: It's big enough for my waist length locs. No worries about trying to stuff my hair into a shower cap and wondering if the elastic is going to break or give way. I highly recommend this shower cap. I would give it five stars, however the plastic is a hair thinner so I am not sure about the longevity of it. I am going to be careful with it, however, because otherwise it is a great, big shower cap and a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Onetempi

customer_reviews.title: This really is a JUMBO shower cap!
customer_reviews.text: Believe the reviews - this is a HUGE shower cap! I have locs half-way down my back that I've been growing over 16 yrs. and this cap is more than enough to hold them and keep the dry when showering. It seems well-made and I suspect it will last for many months to come. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: KingSimba

customer_reviews.title: Didn't even hold up for 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I do a lot of braid styles and needed a roomy shower cap. I got it in October and the cap started to unravel from the elastic in early December. I haven't had any heavy braid styles since I bought the cap, so I'm not understanding what caused the damage, but I would suggest getting a heavier and more durable shower cap if you have thicker or heavier braids.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Mad
customer_reviews.text: Brought this item and wore it one time the band was very loose. It did not have a tight fit. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Marquita Baytop

customer_reviews.title: Fits Well
customer_reviews.text: This thing is huge. It's tight enough around the hair line so water doesn't get it. This fits my braids really well and there is still a lot of room. I'm not sure what hair style WOULDN'T fit under this!
customer_reviews.author: Rhea Ross

customer_reviews.title: I have a really big head and it fits just right.
customer_reviews.text: Not only is it cheap, but it holds well. I bought this over a month ago and I havent experienced any probelms. AND it's so big that no matter what braids, wig, crochet or any other big hairstyle I have, it covers it completely in the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This shower cap may be the hugest thing I have ever seen or used in my life! I have a faux loc hair style and needed a cap to cover my hair in the shower. This one stands true to its reviews, and its descriptions!! It is enormous, yes. You will look silly, and laugh at yourself, but your hair will remain dry. I have not had any tearing or separation, but the cap IS made of delicate material so be careful with how you handle it while putting on and taking off. When this wears out, I will for sure be ordering another!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Jennings

customer_reviews.title: DOESN’T STAY ON RIGHT
customer_reviews.text: I literally have to use a hair clip to make this tight enough to stay on. I have to bunch up a section of it and clip it but even after all that effort my hair STILL GETS WET......STILL! I know that it’s supposed to be a jumbo size to fit long/thick hair but the elastic opening is not supposed to be XXXL. Nobody’s head is this big!!!! I’ve had it too long to return. ;-(
customer_reviews.author: Personal Buyer

customer_reviews.title: and slips off easily does not have tight hold around the elastic
customer_reviews.text: This shower cap is cheap. It's big yes but it's cheap, and slips off easily does not have tight hold around the elastic. I am used to more high quality shower caps with dual layers to keep out moisture... and I pay half the price for them at T.J.Maxx or Walmart. Would not buy again
customer_reviews.author: Angela Enzinna

customer_reviews.title: Jumbo cap
customer_reviews.text: * Update: Bought Aug 2nd 2018 and lasted until Oct 2019, just stretched out. * Not kidding when the description says jumbo. This is the biggest shower cap I've ever seen. I can take a shower without worrying in my hair is falling out from the cap. Nice durability not weak or easy to tear. Finally something that holds all of my hair with ease!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: It is large as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought numerous shower caps from various sources and the extra large ones still did not cover my hair as I have long hair and pile it on top of my head,,,,my hair would get wet around the edges. The pic encouraged me to buy the Donna Premium Collectiona and I was not disappointed at all- my hair now stays dry after years of searching. I even bought one from a beauty supply and the extra large still allowed the edges to get wet so I am well please with the Donna Premium shower cap. kj
customer_reviews.author: AmazonFan1950

customer_reviews.title: it's huge
customer_reviews.text: So I got this as I just started locs but had loose hair down to my tail bone before and know that my hair is thick and grows fairly fast. the normal plastic shower caps currently barely fit my 9 inches of Sisterlocks so I need something bigger. I can see this one fitting my locs even if they grow down to my waist. Happy to have found something that i can use now and wayyyy down the road.
customer_reviews.author: Lina A Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Large shower cap
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item because I needed a XL shower cap for my medium length braids. This shower cap is extremely large! All of my brains fits but it is a too big. A few sizes smaller would have been better, but I guess it's better to be too big than too small. The quality is in line with the pricing and I expect it to last for a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Taitai

customer_reviews.title: it's huge
customer_reviews.text: This shower cap is huge! I've tried many other brands that stated that they were oversized when in fact they might have fit only a toddler. That's not the case here at all. I even had to put a clamp at the top to size it down just a bit so it would work better for my needs. I'm very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: GravelGertie

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: This cap was so much larger than I expected but that wasn't the issue. It was so uncomfortable. The band around it feels horrible on your forehead. I couldn't wait to take it off as soon as I put it on. I just ended up returning it after a while.
customer_reviews.author: Neisha

customer_reviews.title: Cover All the Big Hair
customer_reviews.text: I went skydiving on vacation & thought about taking this shower cap for an extra parachute. This thing is HUGE, but it was great for a head full of braids & kept me dry.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Thomas

customer_reviews.title: would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: This was much larger than I expected. As someone that has a big forehead, well just a big head in general, I have a hard time finding a shower cap that fits my large head and forget about it even fitting my hair. Thanks to this product I was able to say for the first time in 28 years, WOW this is too big and just for that, 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: MidLife Introvert

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!!
customer_reviews.text: These are large Shower Caps and they are thick and really good quality. I am actually using them for my husband to put over his boots when he comes in from farming or the cattle during the day and doesn't want to take his boots off & on. They work great and are washable and reusable. I'm so happy with these. I know what I'm using them for isn't what they were made for but it's sure working great!!
customer_reviews.author: Heaven4me

customer_reviews.title: Nice shower cap.
customer_reviews.text: I have very long dreadlocks and needed a cap that completely covers my hair with room to grow. This shower so fits the bill perfectly. The elastic is secure and does not compress my head too much but stays on. I wish it came in darker colors like black or red just for variety. Regardless of the color available, I will likely buy another.
customer_reviews.author: CrimsonCountess

customer_reviews.title: Good rubber and hair coverage.
customer_reviews.text: Too big. I became the family clown when I put it on cos of the extreme large size. After all the fun. I tied the top with rubber band. The appearance transformed. It became what I wanted. Good rubber, big for any hair style, can even enter shower fully putting it on. My best shower cap now. Hope top of new products will be modified to make it hAve better shape or appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Janee

customer_reviews.title: Enormous and thin
customer_reviews.text: This product had extremely thin material and elastic does not hold it in place. Is absolutely enormous and allows water to get onto hair quite easily. A waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Spann

customer_reviews.title: Oh, it's jumbo sized alright! ♥️
customer_reviews.text: I use the jumbo Velcro rollers and THIS is exactly what I was looking for! It's plastic, no chemical smell, it's comfortable and has a nice snug fit around my head so it protects my hair very well. If you're looking for a large shower cap, I highly recommend this one!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon L.

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again...will probably need to
customer_reviews.text: This is the biggest shower cap you’ll ever find! It’s great for my super thick, long hair. It’s very comfortable and easy to put on. (I can put it over my entire head then pull it back up to get all the hair.) The only issue I have is that the stitching on the elastic seems weak. So far I’ve been very gentle with it and it’s been ok. I’ve probably used it two months now. Even with that it’s still the best I’ve found. I will be buying another, but probably soon so I have a backup in case my first one breaks.
customer_reviews.author: ...hmmm...

customer_reviews.title: Huge!
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I needed! I have frizzy, voluminous, wild 3C curls and I just tried it on and it FITS EVERYTHING! Now I won’t have to worry about getting my curls wet between wash days! The only thing that I didn’t like was that the material of the shower cap feels a bit thin and cheap. Other than that minor thing, it does the job that I need it to!
customer_reviews.author: Channelle

customer_reviews.title: Cute JUMBO Shower Cap!
customer_reviews.text: If you want a LARGE shower cap, this is exactly what you need. All forms of hair extensions will fit perfectly and comfortably within this cap and I even use it when I just rock my natural hair. I purchased a pink one for myself and purple for my mom and I love the colors! It’s not the most comfortable thing in the world but it’s not uncomfortable either by shower cap standards. Definitely would purchase again! (Although it doesn’t seem I’ll be needing another anytime soon!)
customer_reviews.author: kaylin

customer_reviews.title: Fits all of my
customer_reviews.text: It does the job. It’s definetly big enough to put past shoulder length locs or braids in. To give some perspective, I have Sisterlocs, they are a little past my shoulder in length- this cap fits over my locs and I only fill like half of the cap- which means there’s tons more room for those of you who have thicker/longer locs or have bigger hairdos.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: I have braids I wear nothing but braids my doctor like braids. Reason being I have daily migraines and ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think thank there was a shower cap out there for me. I kept searching and searching and guess what Amazon, I have braids I wear nothing but braids my doctor like braids. Reason being I have daily migraines and my hair stylist know how to do mine. And it makes it easier for Doctor to give me my shots in my head. Therefore, Amazon, when I saw the cap, I was saying nobody but Amazon could do this, its wonderful and I will tell anybody Amazon has everything. Thank you Taz
customer_reviews.author: shirley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Fit!
customer_reviews.text: No matter what hair style I have, this shower cap fits over the style! It is comfortable and covers my entire head! I am so happy I purchased this cap! If you are needing a shower cap to cover your many hair styles, then this is the cap for you! You will be so happy you bought it!!
customer_reviews.author: Marchella Graber

customer_reviews.title: It’s BIG
customer_reviews.text: The shower cap is definitely big. I needed a shower cap big enough for my braided hairstyle...and this is definitely big enough. My shower cap material is a little thin but so far it is holding up. It also has an odd smell but it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: MissBrit

customer_reviews.title: Super Big! Really loving it.
customer_reviews.text: Too big for me. I didn't think it was this large. Don't like the material. Update: Really loving the huge shower cap. I rubber banded the top to take up the slack. Now it fits my head much better. As my locs grow, I'll loosen the rubberband.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa

customer_reviews.title: SUPER JUMBO Shower Cap
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and thick shower cap. Just received so I haven't wore it long enough to rate the durability but I can tell it's not one of the cheaply made cap. As for the size, when you guys advertise super jumbo size, you mean it. Lol. I needed one to fit when I wear my braids and trust me, this will do the job and then some.
customer_reviews.author: Wise Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! This extra large jumbo cap is perfect for my big head and long thick locs lol the material is durable and no linty interior. Has the same material inside and out which is perfect to avoid unwanted lint in your hair, especially in your locs! Also has a stretchy lining so it will stay on. So happy with the price and the quality of this product! Couldn't find anything like this is the stores!! Thank you!!!!
customer_reviews.author: jocelyn weston

customer_reviews.title: Nice cap!
customer_reviews.text: This cap seems to be well made. Definitely large and long hair friendly. Stays put. I use it mainly when conditioning.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great for faux locs!
customer_reviews.text: They were not exaggerating! Definitely a SUPER JUMBO size, perfect for a huge hairstyle like my faux locs. Very pleased. Will reorder again.
customer_reviews.author: L. Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: So essential that I bought 2!
customer_reviews.text: Finally! A shower cap that fits my head and all my hair, even when I have waist-length extensions or an enormous Afro! I now have 2, one to stay at home and one to take on the road with me when I'm traveling!
customer_reviews.author: JM505

customer_reviews.title: Take Your Chances
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 of these, one black and one blue. The black is nice and big and very high quality. The blue one is small and cheaply made. If you get the quality and size of the black one it's 5 stars, if you get the quality and size of the blue one it's 1 star. This shouldn't be a guessing game. Why are the items so vastly different from each other? Would order again if they all came like the black one I got. Would not order again if they all came like the blue one I got.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Good shower cap for people with braids or a lot of hair!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lovely

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: The thing tore within the second day of use. The elastic band is single-stitch sewed onto the plastic shower cap, which makes it more vulnerable to tear. This is not just a problem with a cap I bought. I would return it, but I can.
customer_reviews.author: Juelsy

customer_reviews.title: Good price for product
customer_reviews.text: It did what I wanted it to do. It stoped the steam from getting to my hair which in the past would become frezzy with out a shower cap. This cap is great for my long hair and it stays in place keep the steam and wetness out! I luv it.
customer_reviews.author: Sissy Lara

customer_reviews.title: Will cover any amount of hair!
customer_reviews.text: This will cover all your hair AND even if you have curlers in it! I do wash my face in the shower, however, and the elastic has the plastic covering it for almost an inch. But, it keeps my hair dry during the entire shower.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Houck

customer_reviews.title: Winner!
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of hair and its even more when it is braided. Sometimes its hard to put my hair up so I needed a really big shower cap for all of my hair. this could of held 2 of heads and still kept the water out!
customer_reviews.author: Earlishia Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Be sure to put your hair in a pony tail/bun to not stretch the elastic if the hair is heavy but I love this. I always have long large braids and I can finally use a shower cap that fits
customer_reviews.author: Danie-rich

customer_reviews.title: Huge!
customer_reviews.text: Huge! Actually bigger than I expected, but very effective. Regular size or even "large" shower caps weren't enough to cover my hair when it's up in a bun. With this one my hair is covered well past the hairline with no issue.
customer_reviews.author: Randi

customer_reviews.title: Very, very large!
customer_reviews.text: Cheap, flimsy but okay in a pinch for the price. The elastic is not tight enough, thus water seeps in. However, it's perfect if you have a massive coconut! It is made for long, long hair and/or people with big heads. Not for normal heads, no matter the length of hair,
customer_reviews.author: Loyal customer

customer_reviews.title: Braids.buns and ponytail best friend
customer_reviews.text: This shower cap first felt overwhelming but I have gotten used to it and I love not having to take my bun down to take a shower or my high ponytail. This shower cap can do it all.
customer_reviews.author: Brendaevon

customer_reviews.title: Nice size
customer_reviews.text: Nice. Very good size. I wear 18 in braids and it holds everything inside. It does seem that it might not last long, seems like it might tear easily. I am not sure but i will buy again, when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Shani

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Huge! Even roomier than I needed to completely cover my hair while it's up in a clip conditioning. I turn the blow dryer on it to apply some heat, and other shower caps weren't covering all my hair because of the clip. Perfect
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Too too too big unusable
customer_reviews.text: It was ridiculous. It was so big it would fit a giant Unusable
customer_reviews.author: Ms Terry Richards

customer_reviews.title: Nice product....
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome overall the only thing I can negatively say is it’s kind of poky being plastic around the ears & neck but a couple of snips with your scissors can make it all better (if you do it right) I did :D besides that it’s definitely big enough for longer hair types I’d recommend this especially if you’re the type that like to alter things :)
customer_reviews.author: Mil

customer_reviews.title: Great for dreads
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend has beautiful thick dreads. He had a tough time finding shower caps. This is huge and looks ridiculous when taken out of the package, but worked perfectly for him.
customer_reviews.author: G. Espinosa

customer_reviews.title: Jumbo!!!
customer_reviews.text: This shower cap is HUGE!!! When they describe it as “super jumbo” they’re not kidding! It is way bigger than I need and I don’t use it. I’m stashing it away for when my locs are much longer, it will work then. Definitely for someone with LOTS of hair!
customer_reviews.author: MLL

customer_reviews.title: large enough but not tight enough
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it was big enough for my locked hair to fit under it. But I am disappointed that the elastic is already starting to become loose.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie R. Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Lasts long
customer_reviews.text: Usually the elastic will give way on a shower cap, but I've used this one for over 6 months now. Will buy again, but I don't when I'll need to. Great size for extensions and braided/twisted styles.
customer_reviews.author: Smartest shopper

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Value Perfect Jumbo Size
customer_reviews.text: When you have thick long braids and faux locs then this is the size shower cat you need. Not the cutest but it holds a LOT. This is a real jumbo size.
customer_reviews.author: Jamaican

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never wrote a negative review on Amazon before but I had to on this product. The entire reason I purchased this shower cap is because it claimed to be “ super jumbo” sized. It’s tiny.... The one I received is literally the size of the ones at the dollar store.... like really??? I see some people got big shower caps but mine certainly is not. I took measurements so others can see what I received in the mail today and hopefully not be disappointed like I certainly am.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Cagala

customer_reviews.title: It's REALLY big
customer_reviews.text: If you have your hair in rollers or I suppose have really long hair, then this is nice, but it's HUGE. I'm using it though. A bit too big for me on a regular basis though.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Austin

customer_reviews.title: Fits just right.
customer_reviews.text: I struggled finding a shower cap that would work well with my jumbo box braids. This shower cap is big enough to prevent my braids from getting wet.
customer_reviews.author: archiron

customer_reviews.title: Great jumbo cap
customer_reviews.text: I use to have to wear two shower caps but I don’t now it’s really big and all my braids can fit under it it nice and thick not thin cheap plastic
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Hall

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. It came already damaged and the quality of the elastic is poor.
customer_reviews.author: BRITT

customer_reviews.title: This is a plastic bag with elastic!
customer_reviews.text: This shower cap is not worth the money I spent. It is made out of cheap plastic and is so flimsy! I would not recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: DHS

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for very long hair
customer_reviews.text: Finally a shower cap that covers my entire head of hair. My dreads are a little over 30 inches long and this shower cap fits them perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Williams

customer_reviews.title: A REAL large cap, perfect for thick and/or long hair
customer_reviews.text: OMGOODNESS!! Finally a cap that ca m fit all my hair! If you have long and or thick hair, this is the cap for you. And it's a pretty color and feels sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Winie Rosenbaum

customer_reviews.title: Its huge
customer_reviews.text: Its huge and just what I needed. I can put braids or weave or my natural hair inside the shower cap. This is a good buy and its durable.It keeps water out and i feel secure... I'll be buying another.
customer_reviews.author: 0902virgo

customer_reviews.title: Very big
customer_reviews.text: I got this shower cap Because I have braids, and they won’t fit in a regular shower cap. I wish I would’ve found this along time ago I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Hope M.

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what you need it too, no matter how big your hair
customer_reviews.text: I hate having this thing on my head, especially with box braids. BUT it is an amazing product. It kept my entire head dry through a really long, thorough shower. I also have used it to keep product on my head and it's worked well for that too. I mean, it's a shower cap. It's uncomfortable. But it's not like it's too tight or itchy or anything like that. It's like a fancy kitchen trash bag, but for your hair.
customer_reviews.author: dcarron

customer_reviews.title: Great For Braids & Long Locs
customer_reviews.text: They weren't lying when they said this was super jumbo! I have butt length braids and they can fit 2 times over under this shower cap.
customer_reviews.author: Saharathecat

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: It’s humongous and I love it! I mostly wear my hair in a big puff and this is perfect for it! Right now I’m wearing Senegalese twists and it keeps them from getting wet. This is perfect for heavy braids as well.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline D

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So happy I finally found a shower cap to fit over A must have for Xtra Loooong LOCS!!! mine are to by butt and I can get all of my hair in this shower cap without having to pin it up. There's plenty of room spare. I'll be order several to keep at home and in my travel bags/suitcases!
customer_reviews.author: Jalaysma

customer_reviews.title: Donna collection 2 thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because I had long braid extensions added to my hair for a trip abroad. This shower cap did exactly as expected, kept every strand of hair dry in the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Natashea

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I have Locs and love that this cap is truely extra large. Have had for some time now and it seems to still be durable.
customer_reviews.author: Isha Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Huge!
customer_reviews.text: Huge shower cap! Works very well with my senegalese twist and passion twist braids. I wish I would have found this years ago. Holding up well, so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: TL

customer_reviews.title: There are other ways to use this shower cap.
customer_reviews.text: I use it for a cover for my humidifier in the summer months when it is not being used. Super jumbo size was a perfect covering.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy with a K

customer_reviews.title: Great for astronomers
customer_reviews.text: A non-traditional use is to wrap the end of a Newtonian telescope to reduce dust. Works great for that use.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Fratto

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what you expect !
customer_reviews.text: The perfect bonnet for huge curly/coils:kinky hair! I have had for over 2 months and it has not damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Casual shopper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for braids!
customer_reviews.text: I always had trouble finding a shower cap that would hold my braids. This cap is more than sufficient for "big hair" styles.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: High quality and you get your moneys worth.
customer_reviews.text: Wow. This is huge!!!! The biggest shower capi ever used. Great for hair extensions. And my hair extensions and natural hair stays completely dry.
customer_reviews.author: Yaz

customer_reviews.title: IT'S HUGE
customer_reviews.text: This shower cap is perfect for my very long thick hair. It's challenging to find a shower cap that will fit all my hair into, but this one does.......easily. If you need a super large shower cap, this is exactly what you're looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: This cap is huge yet fits well around the forehead. I have crochet box braids and tried two use two regular sized caps with a scarf. That didn’t work. It was a mess. This solves that problem. This is a Good purchase for styles that require a lot of hair.
customer_reviews.author: Smiley

customer_reviews.title: It’s huge
customer_reviews.text: This is hilariously humongous! When they said jumbo, they were not kidding. This is perfect to keep big hairstyles dry
customer_reviews.author: N. Trapp

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: Finally! The perfect sized shower cap for my hair. Plenty of room and comfortable. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Honey

customer_reviews.title: It's big enough and works great. Also seems pretty sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandmother who keeps her hair teased and needed a big cap for showering between going to the hairdresser. She was using plastic shopping bags to protect her precious tease, but no more! Now she has this and loves it. It's big enough and works great. Also seems pretty sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Elle Brooke

customer_reviews.title: This thing is huge but so is the love of my hair
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't find a shower cap that could contain the voluptuous mass that is my hair, so I just searched for the biggest freakin' one and bought it. No regrets. My hair remains dry AF.
customer_reviews.author: lavitz

customer_reviews.title: Really is lsrge
customer_reviews.text: Nice material. A little larger than so expected, but not a deal breaker since have LOcks
customer_reviews.author: Brenda R. Kittrell

customer_reviews.title: Great size for braids
customer_reviews.text: This works well over my long braids when I have them installed. Keeps the moisture off of my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Gina T. Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It is a great size because I like to roll my hair up and then shower. I fits great for both with rollers and without.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia T Aston

customer_reviews.title: One that fits
customer_reviews.text: I can finally get all of my hair in the shower cap with room for more hair growth.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. E McGue

customer_reviews.title: I love the sizing...
customer_reviews.text: I love the size it's very big. However I wish they would line with terrycloth or satin=like lining. That's what I've really been searching for. But I do like the fit and the fullness it wuld be more durable and comfortable if it were lined, not small at all.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: For those of us who love big HAIR!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a large shower cap that will take all my large curly Afro crochet hairstyles and this is the one! I couldn’t give five stars because I just purchased it and I don’t know it’s durability. But if you love wearing BIG hairstyles like crochets or braids, and tired of using a plastic bag, this is the shower cap you want!
customer_reviews.author: Esty O.

customer_reviews.title: Really large shower cap.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a larger cap, but , this cap is really huge and too big for my needs. Purple color is pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia K

customer_reviews.title: Roomy cap
customer_reviews.text: Hat is constructed nice plastic is not thick but not too thin. True to color. No lining.
customer_reviews.author: Kysha E.

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: It's huge. Not matter how big or long your hair is, this will do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: 2013thistimearound

customer_reviews.title: It's Huge LOL!
customer_reviews.text: It's so big, it's hilarious. No, seriously. It is. But when I get 6 packs of 16" Kanekalon hair braided in, and it falls down my back, everything STILL fits. That's all I need really. :)
customer_reviews.author: Nina Mosley

customer_reviews.title: Big & served it’s purpose.
customer_reviews.text: Long hair or braids this is the perfect cap . Hair stays dry.I’m pleased.
customer_reviews.author: KAY
